svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2023-03-17T03:24:43.043Z" agent="5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/111.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" etag="Dw5GFL1Kd0puMzHCG7XB" version="21.0.6" type="google"><diagram name="第 1 页" id="8KW6ownpBgU4_7ib5rmD"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 188px; height: 1px; padding-top: 45px; margin-left: 13px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.font:
戰爭中使用摩斯電碼的
愛情故事

switch.text: 戰爭中使用摩斯電碼的 愛情故事

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 138px; height: 1px; padding-top: 230px; margin-left: 38px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
交代男女主角背景
while WAR II
男：上場打仗
女：留在家鄉

switch.text: 交代男女主角背景while WAR II...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 213px; height: 1px; padding-top: 410px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
女孩和男孩家人流淚
望著軍人把男主角帶走
那已經是煙硝四起的背景
到處烽火連天
男孩此時回眸

switch.text: 女孩和男孩家人流淚望著軍人把男主角帶走那已經是煙硝四起的背景到處烽火連天男孩此時回眸...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 138px; height: 1px; padding-top: 230px; margin-left: 326px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: 戰爭中

switch.text: 戰爭中

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 212px; height: 1px; padding-top: 410px; margin-left: 289px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
男孩在壕溝上衝鋒陷陣
槍林彈雨
身旁的弟兄血肉模糊
有些已經沒了氣息，
有些痛得無法哀號

switch.text: 男孩在壕溝上衝鋒陷陣槍林彈雨身旁的弟兄血肉模糊有些已經沒了氣息，有些痛得無法哀號...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 138px; height: 1px; padding-top: 230px; margin-left: 620px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: 使用摩斯電碼

switch.text: 使用摩斯電碼

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 212px; height: 1px; padding-top: 410px; margin-left: 583px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
男孩在緊張難耐
無法入眠的午夜
偷偷使用電報機，
發送訊息給在家鄉的女友

switch.text: 男孩在緊張難耐無法入眠的午夜偷偷使用電報機，發送訊息給在家鄉的女友...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 115px; height: 1px; padding-top: 590px; margin-left: 631px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: 你還好嗎?

switch.text: 你還好嗎?

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 130px; height: 1px; padding-top: 780px; margin-left: 624px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
我還好
你有受傷嗎?

switch.text: 我還好 你有受傷嗎?

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 144px; height: 1px; padding-top: 980px; margin-left: 617px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
我好害怕
你明天就不在了

switch.text: 我好害怕 你明天就不在了

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 144px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1160px; margin-left: 617px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
我也害怕
但不管明天如何
我們都擁有今天

switch.text: 我也害怕但不管明天如何我們都擁有今天...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 143px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1365px; margin-left: 618px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
我愛你
我也愛你

switch.text: 我愛你 我也愛你

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 138px; height: 1px; padding-top: 230px; margin-left: 914px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: 男主角受傷

switch.text: 男主角受傷

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 212px; height: 1px; padding-top: 410px; margin-left: 877px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
男主角的小隊在
戰場上受傷
也受重傷
無法傳遞訊息

switch.text: 男主角的小隊在戰場上受傷也受重傷無法傳遞訊息...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 177px; height: 1px; padding-top: 665px; margin-left: 895px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
女主角徹夜難眠
因為今晚沒了音訊

switch.text: 女主角徹夜難眠 因為今晚沒了音訊

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 239px; height: 1px; padding-top: 855px; margin-left: 851px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
男主角陷入昏迷
在夢中他陷入奔跑
想要逃出槍林彈雨，逃出困境

switch.text: 男主角陷入昏迷在夢中他陷入奔跑想要逃出槍林彈雨，逃出困境...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 138px; height: 1px; padding-top: 230px; margin-left: 1160px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
男主角倖存
被送回前線營地

switch.text: 男主角倖存 被送回前線營地

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 212px; height: 1px; padding-top: 410px; margin-left: 1123px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
男主角在營地中傳遞了
他受傷了，但安好的訊息

switch.text: 男主角在營地中傳遞了他受傷了，但安好的訊息...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 168px; height: 1px; padding-top: 915px; margin-left: 1145px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
女主角欣喜萬分
她長舒了一口氣

switch.text: 女主角欣喜萬分她長舒了一口氣...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 160px; height: 1px; padding-top: 690px; margin-left: 1149px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
我受傷了
但我一切安好

switch.text: 我受傷了 但我一切安好

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 138px; height: 1px; padding-top: 230px; margin-left: 1423px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
他們互相在
深夜打氣

switch.text: 他們互相在 深夜打氣

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 212px; height: 1px; padding-top: 410px; margin-left: 1386px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
他們在各自的營地，房間
用著電報機互相取暖
向外同望著這份月圓

switch.text: 他們在各自的營地，房間用著電報機互相取暖向外同望著這份月圓...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 138px; height: 1px; padding-top: 230px; margin-left: 1683px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: 最後戰爭結束了

switch.text: 最後戰爭結束了

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 212px; height: 1px; padding-top: 410px; margin-left: 1646px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
男主角坐著車子回家
雖然遍體鱗傷
但最終兩人互相擁抱

switch.text: 男主角坐著車子回家雖然遍體鱗傷但最終兩人互相擁抱...
